author: Robert Hook
title: Application of AI in UI/UX design
description: Explore advanced applications of AI in UI/UX design. Learn how artificial intelligence is transforming user experiences, from smart interfaces to automated design systems. This course covers practical tools, real-world case studies, and hands-on projects to help you integrate AI into your design workflow.

author: Robert Hook
title: Design Thinking From Scratch
description: Unlock the power of innovation with the 'Design Thinking From Scratch' course. Perfect for beginners, this course teaches the fundamentals of design thinking, including empathy, ideation, prototyping, and testing. Gain practical skills through exercises and expert guidance.

author: Robert Hook
title: Figma: Create Better Design System
description: Master Figma and learn to create robust design systems for your projects. This intermediate course covers best practices, reusable components, and collaborative workflows to streamline your design process.

author: Robert Hook
title: Create a Portfolio as a UI/UX Designer
description: Build a professional portfolio to showcase your UI/UX skills. This course guides you through portfolio structure, project presentation, and personal branding to help you stand out in the design industry.
